Name: Turquoise Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A blue-rinsed Daiquiri with orange and pineapple - with tequila instead of rum it would be a twisted Margarita .
Nutrition: One serving of Turquoise Daiquiri contains 164 calories
